text:
YUM!  I have eaten at both the cart and the restaurant. And had delivery.  The Harvest <pita sandwich> is my absolute favorite, somewhat to my surprise, because I usually go carnivore, and I generally don't like sandwiches.  The <Baba Ganoush> and <falafel> are terrific.  We have been sampling widely on the menu, and have yet to find anything we don't like. 

Anyway, the food and the service are great.  Highly recommend.
